Package com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.query.text.fields

This package contains the classes for the PDB Connector Text Query field definitions

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRangeQueryField<T>
    An abstract QueryField for range values
    QueryField
    This class represents a single query field.
    QueryField.QueryFieldFactory
    A factory class to return the correct implementation from the JSON definition
    QueryFieldDateRange
    A query field for a date range
    QueryFieldDoubleRange
    Query field for a Double range
    QueryFieldDropdown
    A query field to allow choosing from a list of values , either in a single DialogComponentStringSelection (via a JComboBox) or a DialogComponentStringArrayInput if multiple values are allowed
    QueryFieldFullText
    A special QueryField for the full text field, which has no operator choice, only a text input, and a much-simplified JSON query
    QueryFieldHasLigand
    An added field to create a 'has ligand' query, which was removed from the new interface
    QueryFieldIntegerRange
    Query field for an Integer range
    QueryFieldRegistry
    Registry of query fields, loaded from a static JSON definition file via PdbStaticSchemaLoader This class is a singleton which should be accessed via the static accessor method QueryFieldRegistry.getInstance()
    QueryFieldRuntimeDate
    This is a special QueryField implementation for Date query fields which are execution-time dependent.
    QueryFieldString
    A query field for a free-text input.
    QueryFieldSuggester
    A QueryFieldString with dynamic text suggestion via a Suggester

Package com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.query.text.fields Description

This package contains the classes for the PDB Connector Text Query field definitions
